title: Our Good Night Story
description: A girl and her mom are getting ready to read stories in their comfy chairs. Lucky, the dog, begins to bark. Does Lucky want to read a story, too? Students will have the opportunity to sequence events while connecting with prior knowledge. Detailed, supportive illustrations and repetitive phrases support readers.
